014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.fields;
016
017import static java.lang.String.format;
018import static org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.IgnoreWarnFail.checkIgnoreWarnFailState;
019
020import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.Field;
021import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.InterpolatorFactory;
022import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.TransformerRegistry;
023import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueProvider;
024import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.StringDefinition;
025
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Optional;
028import java.util.StringJoiner;
029
030import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
031import com.google.common.base.Strings;
032import com.google.common.collect.Lists;
033
034public final class StringField extends Field<String, StringDefinition> {
035
036    private final ValueProvider valueProvider;
037
038    @VisibleForTesting
039    public static StringField forTesting(StringDefinition stringDefinition, ValueProvider valueProvider) {
040        return new StringField(stringDefinition, valueProvider, InterpolatorFactory.forTesting(), TransformerRegistry.INSTANCE);
041    }
042
043    public StringField(final StringDefinition stringDefinition, final ValueProvider valueProvider,
044        final InterpolatorFactory interpolatorFactory, final TransformerRegistry transformerRegistry) {
045        super(stringDefinition, interpolatorFactory, transformerRegistry);
046
047        this.valueProvider = valueProvider;
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    public String getFieldName() {
052        // This is not the property name (because many definitions can map onto one prop)
053        // but the actual id.
054        return fieldDefinition.getId();
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    public String getValue() {
059        final List<String> values = Lists.newArrayList();
060
061        final Optional<String> propValue = valueProvider.getValue();
062        final List<String> definedValues = fieldDefinition.getValues();
063
064        // Only add the value from the provider if it is not null.
065        propValue.ifPresent(values::add);
066
067        values.addAll(definedValues);
068
069        for (String value : values) {
070            var stringResult = Strings.nullToEmpty(value);
071            if (fieldDefinition.isBlankIsValid() || !stringResult.isBlank()) {
072                return formatResult(value);
073            }
074        }
075
076        checkIgnoreWarnFailState(false, fieldDefinition.getOnMissingValue(),
077            () -> "",
078            () -> format("No value for string field %s found, using an empty value!", getFieldName()));
079
080        return "";
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public boolean isExposeAsProperty() {
085        return fieldDefinition.isExport();
086    }
087
088    @Override
089    public String toString() {
090        return new StringJoiner(", ", StringField.class.getSimpleName() + "[", "]")
091            .add("stringDefinition=" + fieldDefinition)
092            .add("valueProvider=" + valueProvider)
093            .toString();
094    }
095}
